Title: Workflow rules only check the file extension for the mimetype instead of the content

CWE.name: Reliance on File Name or Extension of Externally-Supplied File

Description: A bug in Nextcloud Server 17.0.1 causes the workflow rules to depend their behaviour on the file extension when checking file mimetypes.
Resolution: It is recommended that the Nextcloud Server is upgraded to 17.0.2.
